rows.label: tlk70000049_02_msg001
rows.name:
Prince Adel. I am sure you do not
need to be told this, but I implore you
nonetheless to be careful.

rows.label: tlk70000049_02_msg002
rows.name:
Your compassion is your greatest asset,
but sometimes I fear you are too quick
to put your own safety on the line.

rows.label: tlk70000049_02_msg003
rows.name:
While helping others is admirable,
prudence is also an important virtue.

rows.label: tlk70000049_02_msg004
rows.name:
Though I know you do not like to hear
it, your life carries more weight than
that of the average man.

rows.label: tlk70000049_02_msg005
rows.name:
You are the King's only son. It would
be a tragedy if anything were to happen
to you. Please just keep that in mind.
